name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Hubert E. BLOUNT, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Hubert E. BLOUNT, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Court of Common Pleas is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert B. Lawler, Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
431 A.2d 279
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Hubert E. BLOUNT, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 21, 1981.
Decided July 10, 1981.
George Gershenfeld, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
